text: 'iinaa 'anzalna altawrat fiha 'irshad min aldlalt, wbyan llahkam, waqad hakam biha alnbyuwn -aldhyn anqadu lihukm allh, waqru bh- bayn alyhwd, walam yakhrujuu ean hukmiha walam yuharrifwha, wahukim biha eubbad alyhwd wfqhawhm aladhin yrbbun alnaas bshre allh; dhlk 'ana anbya'hm qad astamnwhm ealaa tblygh altwrat, wfiqh kitab allah waleamal bh, wakan alrabaaniuwn wal'ahbar shuhada' ealaa 'an anbya'hm qad qadawa fi alyhwd bikitab allh. wayaqul taealaa lieulama' alyhwd wahbarhm: fala takhshawua alnaas fi tanfidh hkmy; fa'iinahum laa yaqdirun ealaa nfekm wala darrikm, wlkn akhshwny fa'iiniy 'ana alnafe aldar, wala takhudhuu bitark alhukm bima anzlt ewdana hqyrana. alhukm bighayr ma 'anzal allah min 'aemal 'ahl alkfr, faladhin ybdlwn hukm allah aladhi 'anzalah fi ktabh, fyktmwnh wyjhdwnh wyhkmwn bghyrh metqdyn hlh wjwazh fawlyk hum alkafrwn
